about_the_game:
This is a survivor game

Through repeated choices, the character becomes stronger and stronger, and is fearless even when surrounded by monsters.

The game background is based on Chinese immortal cultivation

The protagonist is an immortal cultivator, flying on a sword. He can fly to higher skies, and the difficulty of the battle increases accordingly.

Map mode

Each map has two modes, life mode and defeat mode.

In life mode, the protagonist will fly to the next level after a period of time.

In defeat mode, the protagonist will fly to the next level after defeating a certain number of monsters.

Skill enhancement

Each skill has 4 to 5 upgrade directions. After the total level of the skill is full, it can be broken through. The breakthrough type is shared by all skills, so in theory, there are many final forms of the skill.

Content unlocking method

Unlock game content by completing unlocking achievements, such as new skills, new maps, etc.

name: Nine Heavens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060, Radeon RX 5600 XT, or Intel Arc A580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is a survivor game with Chinese immortal cultivation as the background. After reaching certain conditions, the player will go to the next level and the monsters will become stronger.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean
